column1: #text=A week ago I decided I wanted to go to the local library and borrow a book .
#text=This is something I have n't done since I was a kid , so I was n't sure if the process had changed .
#text=I drove over to the library which was about 5 miles away from my house .
#text=When I arrived I walked inside and was surprised to discover the interior had dramatically changed since the last time I had been there .
#text=Once I composed myself , I began my quest to search for a good book .
#text=I did n't have anything particular in mind , but then I thought back to the times when I was a kid and liked books about medieval history .
#text=So I went over to the history section to see what they had .
#text=I found a book about knights and medieval combat that looked interesting , so I took it to the front desk to check out .
#text=I first had to sign up for a library card , and after that was done I drove home with the book .
